title: Revert unauthorized UI changes and fix 9-ball revert guard

quotes: '+4' projected score next to LS's current score
You never asked for either of these

acceptanceCriteria: The '+4' projected score indicator is completely removed from the scoreboard
Only the actual current score is displayed during active gameplay
No projected total appears next to player scores

requirements.text: Remove the unauthorized live PPI calculation display showing 'PPI: 0.00 | Def: 0' during active gameplay in ApaRackScoringPanel

acceptanceCriteria: Clicking the 9-ball when it is marked as dead automatically reverts it to unscored state
No guard condition blocks the automatic revert behavior for the 9-ball
The 9-ball behaves consistently with the approved revert logic

nonGoals: Adding any new UI displays or calculations
